mapper.insert: insert into cs_notc (bbso_no, ttl, cn, wrtd, wrtr, cate, fst_reg, fst_regr, last_upd,last_updr) VALUES (#{bbsoNo}, #{ttl},#{cn}, #{wrtd},#{wrtr}, #{cate},#{fstReg}, #{fstRegr}, #{lastUpd} ,#{lastUpdr})
mapper.select: select bbso_no, ttl, cn, wrtd, wrtr, cate, fst_reg, fst_regr, last_upd, last_updr, use_yn from cs_notc order by bbso_no desc, wrtd desc
select bbso_no, ttl, cn, wrtd, wrtr, cate, fst_reg, fst_regr, last_upd, last_updr, use_yn from cs_notc order by bbso_no DESC, wrtd DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from cs_notc where true
AND ttl LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
